summary: You're in the Mess Hall, the epicentre of all things spicy
detail: Upon entering the Mess Hall, you're greeted with an all too familiar aroma: curry. The walls are adorned with paintings of suspiciously humanoid chicken drumsticks in regal yet unappetising attire. Incessant gnawing sounds emerge from a bin full of pungent curry containers, and you would place a bet on some kind of lifeform lurking within.

expression.content: As you examine the paintings closely, you notice tiny inscriptions that suggest the works might actually tell the tragic tales of once-great gastronomy-obsessed kings and their inevitable fall at the hands of ruthless nutritional backlash.

As you peer into the cluster of curry containers timidly, you visibly startle a small army of rodential beings. They appear to be holding utensils with mildly inquisitive intent. They glance at you, evaluating your potential as a future curry buffet, then go back to their gnawing, deeming you unworthy of their savoury ambitions.

Suddenly, Smipp Gorble enters the room, sniffing the air with his trio of nostrils. He spots the Curry Potion on your person and exclaims, "By the tentacles of Targnod! You have finally found it! Perhaps these monstrous stomach aliens can be tamed, after all. Shall we try in concerted camaraderie?"

expressions.content: Under your combined efforts, the Curry Potion works its magic, radiating deep microcosmic culinary understanding. The monstrous stomach aliens feel a spiritual swelling of peace and release your derelict vessel, allowing your shenanigans to continue forthwith.
